text: tavada (naya laba gat aya, eya niyamita varikayata geva gata nohækiva) ohu amarukamehi sitiyahot, (ohuta geva gænimata) vatkamak lækhena turu balaporottuven sitinu. tavada (mehi æti pin) oba danneku vasayen sitiyahot, (eya ohutama) oba danaya vasayen dima (an ayata danaya dimata vada) obata itamat pin (ayiti vanu æta)
